message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not willing to pay $1,500,000. I'm willing to pay $800,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  However, the value of this product is truly significant and $800,000 undervalues it. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This offer represents a significant investment on your part, but I believe the return you'll see will be well worth it.

I understand your perspective on the product's value, but I'm still not willing to pay $1,300,000. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.
